tilt.image.matchup

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • tilt.image.matchup.Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    A rewrite of the line-joining algorithm.We use a greedy approach. Differences between all points on the left and right are stored on a minimum priority queue, and those with the smallest differences are joined first.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix(int[] list1, int[] list2, Options options)
      Compute the best alignment of two arrays of ints
